mapper.sql: qid, bid, qtype, choice_question, optionA, optionB, optionC, optionD, answer, status, create_operator, create_operator_id, create_time, flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
,
from sys_questions
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_questions (qid, bid, qtype, choice_question, optionA, optionB, optionC, optionD, answer, status, create_operator, create_operator_id, create_time, flag, original, translation) values (#{qid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{choiceQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optiond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createOperatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{original,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{translation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_questions
qid = #{record.qid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bid = #{record.bid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qtype = #{record.qtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
choice_question = #{record.choiceQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionA = #{record.optiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionB = #{record.optionb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionC = #{record.optionc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

translation = #{record.translation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
